sentences.sContent: But man's soul is most awake in his knowledge of the interchangeability of the term "existence" and "transitoriness".
sentences.sContent_eng: But man's soul is most awake in his knowledge of the interchangeability of the term "existence" and "transitoriness".
sentences.sCn: 但是对于于“存在”与“短暂”的可互换性，只有人的大脑才能最清楚地意识到。

sentences.sContent: Without transitoriness, without beginning or end, birth or death, there is no time, either.
sentences.sContent_eng: Without transitoriness, without beginning or end, birth or death, there is no time, either.
sentences.sCn: 没有短暂，没有开始与结束、生与死，时间也就不复存在。
